"Ria":
"Trouble with the gun controls!?
Damn... Falling back temporarily!"
"Up here! Recon flight is in progress!"
"Up here! I'm in recon flight formation!"

"I brought you
some supplies!
Dropping them!"

"Hmm... these supplies are
strangely heavy, somehow..."
"Commencing covering fire."

"Ahhhhhh... I can't recover,
making an emergency landing!"

"Excuse me! I need protection
during the repairs!"

"Please cover me during
the repairs! Umm... I
hope I can fix this..."

"Enemy signs from the
front! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from the
right! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from
behind! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from the
left! They're inbound!"

"Damage has exceeded 70%!
A-any more than this is bad!"

"That's all she can
take! Abandon ship!"

"Repairs are complete!
Thank you very much
for the protection!"

"Huh... it's still a no-go? Sorry, have to
make another emergency landing!"

"I'll fix this as many times as
it takes! So, please, guard me!"
"Ooh, this feels hopeless..."
"Oh no! No!!! Sorry, abandon ship!"

"Sorry to trouble you! I'm
alright now! Thanks a lot!"

"Huh? I can't control it...?!
Emergency! Abandon ship!"

"Trouble with the meters!?
Damn... retreating a moment!"
"Up here! Searching for enemy signs!"

"Up here! I'm in enemy
search formation!"

"Now dropping relief
supplies! Please be careful!"

"Those supplies I just delivered,
were they really supplies...?"
"Commencing covering fire."

"Ahhhhh... the steering isn't
working! Emergency landing!"

"Sorry! Could you protect
me during the repairs?"

"Please guard me while I
repair the craft! I'm not
sure if I can fix this!"

"Enemy signs from the
front! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from the
right! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from
behind! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from the
left! They're inbound!"

"The damage is getting worse!
I can't repair this fast enough
to keep up with the damage!"
"Oh no! It's hopeless! Abandon ship!"

"Thanks for waiting! The
repairs are totally finished!"

"Great... Emergency stoppage
of the engines! Making an
emergency landing!"

"Just needs a few more
adjustments... Sorry, but
please watch my back again!"

"She's taking hits faster
than I can patch her
up... Is this the end?"

"We got this far... But...!
Evacuate! I'm sorry!"

"Sorry to trouble you! I'm
alright now! Thanks a lot!"

"Huh? I can't control it...?!
Emergency! Abandon ship!"

"What's the cause of this trouble!?
Damn... I'm falling back for a moment!"
"Up here! Recon mission in progress!"

"Up here! I'm in recon
mission formation!"

"You guys OK? I brought
you some supplies!"

"Is that a heat source in there...?
Oh, well, whatever, here you go!"
"Commencing covering fire."

"Oh jeez! I'm losing control! Coming
in for an emergency landing!"

"Repairing the craft! Please,
protect me in the meantime!"

"I believe I can fix this!
Please protect me!"

"Enemy signs from the
front! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from the
right! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from
behind! They're inbound!"

"Enemy signs from the
left! They're inbound!"

"Aaahhhh, my poor baby is
getting more and more beat up!"

"Sorry, I couldn't fix it!
I'm getting out of here!"

"Repairs are complete!
There's a good girl...
Let's soar the skies!"

"Aah! That quick patch-up didn't help!
Sorry! Time for another landing!"

"Argh, so soon!? Sorry, but I've got
to make more repairs! Cover me!"

"We're not out of the woods yet!
But battered or otherwise,
I absolutely will repair her!"
"Ohhh... My poor baby..."

"Sorry to trouble you! I'm
alright now! Thanks a lot!"

"Huh? I can't control it...?!
Emergency! Abandon ship!"
